headline: Most Florida voters oppose abortion bans, polls show
author: Langston Taylor
sentences: During the 2020 election cycle, an Ipsos/Reuters poll regularly asked likely voters in Florida whether they agreed with the more general statement abortion should be legal in most cases.? All five times, a majority ranging from 56 to 60 percent agreed, while 35 percent of respondents or fewer disagreed.
